title: DTP Naskh OT Font Not Aligning Properly to top of page
content:
I am trying to use the DTP Naskh OT font in InDesign. The problem we are facing is that the tops of the vowels do not align flush to the top of the text box. There is a small amount of white space that remains at the top of each page. This is not a problem with the Lotus Linotype font which is always flush to the top.

Can anyone help. Much appreciated.  
Abdur
author: Abdur

comments.content: In InDesign you can set the distance from the top of a text block. If a particular font does not behave as you wish using the default setting, go into the 'Text Frame Options' dialogue (Object menu) and adjust the setting for the individual text frame(s).
